description: Comic Adam Sandler's Saturday Night Live moments as Canteen Boy, Cajun Man, Opera Man, and much more, including hilarious songs like the Hanukkah song and the Christmas song, are shown.
keywords: tv special,stand up comedy,saturday night live,reference to adam sandler,social satire
name: Saturday Night Live: The Best of Adam Sandler

original_info.id: Saturday Night Live: The Best of Adam Sandler_1999
original_info.name: Saturday Night Live: The Best of Adam Sandler

review.name: best scenes, feelings towards snl
review.reviewBody:
i think the best scenes were "Canteen Boy" and of coarse "Lunch Lady Land"....oh yes and "Cajun Man"....adam sandler is hilarious...

also, saturday night live isnt what it used to be...it was so much better when the cast consisted of adam sandler, chris farley, david spade, rob schnieder, kevin nealon, tim meadows, phil hartman, mike myers, dana carvey....the best skits from then i think were "simon", "gap girls", "canteen boy", "the chris farley show", "the ladies man"(i know thats a little newer, but tim meadows was on for a while), "schmidts gay", "opera man", "waynes world", "church lady", "cajun man" and so many more...i also like when jim bruer was on the show...hes funny as hell...

snl is pretty much horrible now...the only people i find to be funny on it is jimmy fallon and horatio sands...and even they are not that funny...i do like though when jimmy fallon cant hold his laughter...hes notorious for busting up laughing while people are trying to act, i love that...

thats just what i think though
